mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_id, email, password, roles, name, nick_name, address, phone_number, birth_day, date_email_checked, email_token, profile_image_url) VALUES (#{id}, #{email}, #{password}, #{roles}, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{address}, #{phoneNumber}, #{birthDay}, #{dateEmailChecked}, #{emailToken}, #{profileImageUrl})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT email FROM user WHERE email = #{email} )
